info_how_to_play: Navigate the maze to the exit before the timer runs out.
info_maze_options: You can customize the maze generation using the menu options. Adjust difficulty levels, set custom timer durations, and change maze dimensions to suit your preference.
info_languages: The game supports Spanish, English, and German. You can find the language selector in the top corner of the screen.
info_controls: You can control the player moving through the maze manually using WASD keys or the Arrow keys.
info_voice_commands_detail: Alternatively, activate voice control to move using voice commands! Commands can range from simple directions to more complex instructions depending on the chosen language.
info_sound_required: For a better experience, please enable your device sound.
